channel.title: Where has my topic gone?
channel.description:
In the team developments board I posted a topic for people to realize there are better solutions out there than DropBox. Everyone there seems to be getting screwed by either having their source leaked or deleted.
I was providing them with a new way that would solve the deletion of their source. As well as allow them to revert back to any position they felt necessarily for whatever reason. (If they added something that was horrible or just didn't work out, or knowing them.. caused too many errors to fix).
I then went on to explain to them to not just accept anyone into their team and put them through some tests. Thus making sure they have some credibility and actually will know how to help you with what you want for your server.
I was simply giving out useful information on how to solve 3 different issues that i'd say 80% of this community have. I guess the mods here don't want to have a better community?

item.title: Where has my topic gone?
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

@Staff: I don’t know who removed it or why. If you’d like to talk to me about it, I’m all ears.

Closing this topic, as it’s been solved and further discussion of the matter can be done within the thread itself.

Read full topic

item.title: Where has my topic gone?
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

[quote=“Bryanc, post:3, topic:415507”]Considering the thread was directed at the team development and only at them I opted to post it there. It could have been stickied since it was something useful for everyone there.

Now may I remind you, the post wasn’t moved to another board. It was just deleted entirely.[/quote]
That is a moderator’s discretion whether or not the thread is removed or moved to another board, as well as if the thread deserved to be stickied.

Read full topic

item.title: Where has my topic gone?
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Your thread was probably removed because it wasn’t a development related topic. It’s talked about whatever your talking about now, not a development of some server, client etc.

Read full topic
